mapper.select: select table_name tableName, engine, table_comment tableComment, create_time createTime from information_schema.tables where table_name = #{tableName} ORDER BY create_time desc LIMIT 0,1

SELECT t.currentSchema, t.tableSchema, t.tableName, t.engine, t.tableComment, t.createTime FROM ( SELECT (SELECT DATABASE()) currentSchema, table_schema tableSchema, table_name tableName, engine, table_comment tableComment, create_time createTime FROM information_schema.TABLES WHERE table_schema NOT IN ( 'information_schema', 'performance_schema', 'mysql', 'sys' ) AND table_name NOT IN ('flyway_schema_history') ) t WHERE (t.currentSchema IS NULL OR t.tableSchema = (SELECT DATABASE()))
and t.tableName like concat('%', #{tableName}, '%')
order by t.createTime desc
limit #{offset}, #{limit}
